page.title: 09Housing: old & new
page.content: Cumnor village has many old houses of various periods, infilled with newer homes. After 1920 there was much building between the old village and Botley. On cumnor Hill the houdes tend to be large with big gardens thouh recently many have been built infilling these large plots. Private building of smaller houses has taken place in the Chawley and Appleton Road areas. At Farmoor a small community of houses built betwen the wars along the Eynsham Road has developed into a larger one with the building of many private houses of the samller type especially between the older houses and the Farmoor reservoir. Considerable private building by developers is taking place at Cumnor and Dean Court.
